title: MEANWHILE, IN FLEX QUEUE (lul)
body:
i just got to my series out of bronze 4, no big deal. the teams were pretty evenly matched and I had fun.

their team (represented with dynamicQ ranks):
gold V Renekton top
gold  IV Olaf jungle
gold IV Azir mid
bronze II Ezreal ADC
silver IV Sona support

my team (represented with dynamicQ ranks):
gold V Heimerdinger top
silver II Xin Zhao (me) jungle
Silver II Zed mid
Gold V Sivir ADC
Gold IV Veigar support

the only reason i mention all of the above is because it was a really close game, we had a pretty shite comp, but we still managed to win, it went to 47 minutes. it was really back and forth, but we had better wave clear so we could keep our turrets alive.

now think about all of this, and realize this was a promo match to get out of bronze IV. they didn't even give me an auto-win for the series so i have to actually win 2/3 games to progress... lol. I wonder if this will be another "beat this plat lucian to get out of bronze in your promos" situations I had last season.

I get flex mmr is separate from dynamic mmr... but seriously.... where do they expect all the mid bronze players to go? their mmr will be so tanked they'll never climb out of bronze even if they get substantially better because they will only ever win like 10 lp and lose like 30 lol....

why is flex queue such a joke?
